name: SpaceJump (talzxc)
description:
SpaceJump is a platformer game with a twist. Your goal is to reach the spaceship, collect stars and avoid enemy aliens! This game combines the functionality of two classic retro games: the platforming of Donkey Kong and the ball movement of the original Golf for the NES. The player is controlling the ball hero by pointing a direction with the mouse and adjusting jump strength by holding the left mouse button.

Hope you enjoy!
